text: Xavier Rudd (born 1978) is an Australian musician. He grew up in the small town of Torquay, Victoria, Australia. When Rudd was young, he learned to play the didgeridoo on a vacuum cleaner hose. Rudd is known for playing at music festivals and concerts in Australia and in North America. He has many fans in Australia, his home, as well as Canada, where he has recorded a few live albums. Some of his songs have political themes that deal with the father of 2 sons environment and the rights of Aboriginal Australians. ==Personal life== Rudd also describes himself as a full-time "barefooter", which means that he does not own any shoes or other footwear. Rudd is also a vegetarian. ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== * To Let (2002) * Solace (2004) * Food in the Belly (2005) * White Moth (2007) * Dark Shades of Blue (2008) * Koonyum Sun *with Izintaba (2010) * Spirit bird (2012) ===Live albums=== * Live in Canada (2001) * Live at the Grid (2003) * Good Spirit (2005) ==References== ==Other websites== * Xavier Rudd web site * Xavier Rudd Tour Dates and Gossip * Live Shows on archive.org * Live concert from Amsterdam on Fabchannel * Undercover news story * Xavier Rudd Article * Xavier Rudd interview at Bonnaroo 2007 Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Australian singers Category:Musicians from Victoria (Australia) Category:Australian guitarists Category:Didgeridoo players Category:Banjo players Category:Blues guitarists Category:Australian folk musicians
title: Xavier Rudd
